# visualEffect

**Instance Property**

The visual effect to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to.

## Declaration

```swift
var visualEffect: UIVisualEffect? { get set }
```

## Configuring separator appearance

- **color**: The color to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to.
- **multipleSelectionColor**: The color to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to when the item is in a multiple-selection group.
